TITLE: Robinhood shares jump 25% after crypto CEO Sam Bankman-Fried acquires stake
SUMMARY: Robinhood shares jumped 25% after the CEO of a major crypto exchange took a stake in the retail investing app Thursday.

TITLE: Heavily shorted online used car seller Carvana surges nearly 25%, is halted several times
SUMMARY: Shares of online used car retailer Carvana surged Thursday amid a wild trading session.

TITLE: MicroStrategy's bitcoin bet looks shaky as crypto market encounters turbulence
SUMMARY: MicroStrategy, which has bet big on bitcoin over the past two years, is now underwater on its holdings of the world's largest cryptocurrency.

TITLE: Retail investors are continuing to buy the dip in tech despite recent turmoil, says TD Ameritrade
SUMMARY: Retail investors have continued to buy the dip in the recent market turmoil, liking tech despite the sector rout, according to TD Ameritrade's AJ Kahling.

TITLE: Grayscale tells SEC that turning biggest bitcoin fund into ETF will unlock $8 billion for investors
SUMMARY: A spot-based bitcoin ETF has eluded the industry for over five years. With an SEC deadline coming up, will Grayscale finally break through?

TITLE: SoFi stock falls after fintech firm accidentally releases first-quarter report early
SUMMARY: SoFi blamed the early release of its results on human error, according to CNBC's Kate Rooney.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs is shrinking its SPAC business amid regulatory crackdown and market turmoil
SUMMARY: Goldman is scaling back its business in SPACs as blank check deals got caught in a double whammy of a regulatory crackdown and a tough market environment.

TITLE: How Elliott Associates' proposal to split two businesses at Western Digital may build value
SUMMARY: The activist investor said Western Digital’s share price may go up if it separates its NAND flash memory business.

TITLE: Luna Foundation Guard further bolsters stablecoin reserve by raising $1.5 billion in bitcoin
SUMMARY: The Luna Foundation Guard has acquired another $1.5 billion in bitcoin for its UST reserve through an OTC sale of luna, its governance token.

TITLE: Elon Musk and Cathie Wood knock passive index investing, saying it’s gone too far
SUMMARY: Elon Musk and Cathie Wood took aim at index funds, arguing that passive investments have controlled too big a percentage of the stock market.

TITLE: Despite the Fed’s big rate boost, most banks will still pay paltry interest rates
SUMMARY: The cost of money is rising for borrowers. So why aren't savers being rewarded?

TITLE: Op-ed: Stocks have been a horror show. Here’s how to tell when the market is near capitulation
SUMMARY: Investors who keep their eyes closed for the most harrowing scenes may miss out on bargains.

TITLE: Top Wall Street analysts are getting bullish on these stocks for the long run
SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks including eBay and Booking Holdings.

TITLE: Warren Buffett says Berkshire owns 9.5% of Activision Blizzard shares in merger arbitrage bet
SUMMARY: Warren Buffett on Saturday said Berkshire Hathaway has been increasing its stake in Activision Blizzard in a merger arbitrage play.

TITLE: Warren Buffett gives his most expansive explanation for why he doesn't believe in bitcoin
SUMMARY: Despite a shift in public perception about the cryptocurrency, Buffett still wouldn't buy bitcoin.

TITLE: Warren Buffett rips Wall Street for turning the stock market into ‘a gambling parlor'
SUMMARY: Warren Buffett has a long history of deriding investment bankers and their institutions.

TITLE: Charlie Munger says the Robinhood trading app is justly 'unraveling' for 'disgusting' practices
SUMMARY: Berkshire Hathaway Vice Chairman Charlie Munger blasted stock trading app Robinhood on Saturday, saying the company is now "unraveling."

TITLE: Inclusive Capital spots multiple opportunities for upside with an active ESG focus at Verra
SUMMARY: Sarah Farrell, a partner at Inclusive, joined Verra’s board in late 2021. Here’s what could be ahead for the company.

TITLE: Robinhood reports shrinking revenue, fewer active users
SUMMARY: Robinhood was up against some tough comparisons in the first quarter, when interest in so-called meme stocks in 2021 fueled its rapid growth.

TITLE: Bank stocks, once a Buffett favorite, take a back seat at Berkshire Hathaway amid recession worries
SUMMARY: While the pandemic is finally receding in the U.S., Buffett hasn't given the all-clear signal on banks. Why is that?

TITLE: Hedge funds attract the biggest inflows in 7 years on the back of market volatility
SUMMARY: The hedge fund industry attracted its largest inflows in seven years during the first quarter as investors sought downside protection amidst a volatility spike.

TITLE: How European asset manager Tikehau with $40 billion is weathering uncertainty in the region
SUMMARY: Mathieu Chabran sat down with Leslie Picker to discuss the role of alternatives in the region along with his shifting perspective on tech.

TITLE: Invesco launches ETF focused on metals required for electric vehicles, energy transition
SUMMARY: The electric vehicle trade is attracting interest from Wall Street. Invesco's new ETF will give exposure to the metals critical for the energy transition.
